caption:
This photograph captures an intimate and joyful moment between two elderly individuals playing the piano together in a warmly lit room. The woman, seated at the piano, is wearing a black and white patterned dress, glasses, and has her hair styled short. She is actively engaged in playing the piano while singing or conversing. The man, standing beside her with a slight lean over the piano, also wears glasses along with a plaid shirt. He seems to be either singing along or offering guidance on the music piece.

The room is rich in decoration, conveying a cozy, vintage atmosphere. There is a large, regal-looking lamp in the background which, along with other subtle lighting, adds a golden hue to the scene, enhancing the warmth and familial feeling of the moment. The walls are adorned with lovely, classic-style drapes and possibly some wall decorations, though details are indistinct.

Overall, the photograph exudes a sense of shared love for music, companionship, and the comfort of a long-life lived with someone close. The mood is one of contentment and happiness, as portrayed by their expressions and the pleasant setting in which this private concert is taking place.
title: Charles allison, 71, and mrs.  Allison, in their home in milford born in seward county, mr.  Allison operated his own butcher shop in milford for 40 years
